item.title: The beast that is Array.prototype.reduce
item.author: meine@akshendra.com (Akshendra Pratap Singh)
item.description: reduce() is an absolute beast of a method when it comes to functional style programming in JavaScript. The more you use it, the more you see use cases popping everywhere for it. I recently realized, that it has become my goto method, whenever I have to deal with arrays. So I looked through bunch of my code and found a lot of examples, some of which I will list in this post.
